pages.text: And they took gods other than Him that do not create anything and they are created, and they have no power to harm or benefit themselves, and they have no power over death and life and resurrection
And those who disbelieved said: this (Quran) is only a lie that he made up and other people have helped him with it. So they have certainly committed wrongdoing and lie
And they said: (these are) stories of the earlier ones that he copied it and it is dictated to him morning and afternoon
Say: the One who knows the secret of the skies and the earth sent it down. Indeed He is forgiving and merciful
And they said: what is with this messenger that he eats the food and he walks in the markets (and streets), why was not an angel sent down to him to be a warner with him
Or a treasure is not given to him, or there is no garden for him to eat from it? And the wrongdoers said: you are only following a bewitched man
See how they gave examples about you, they are lost and they cannot find a way
Blessed is the One who gives you better than that if He wants, gardens which rivers flow through them and He gives you palaces
No, but they denied the hour and We prepared a burning fire for anyone who denies the hour
